message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $13,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
